channel.title: Registering my account: Human Verification Issues
channel.description: Where this I assume a "captcha" to type, all there is an advertisement. In this case it's for Dish's Hopper service. It forced me to use the audio version which is hard to understand, even for me. It took me 4-5 tries before it finally said I got it right. Just thought I'd mention it as I have another in-game bug to report, but almost said screw it because of the registration issues.

item.title: Registering my account: Human Verification Issues
item.dc:creator: hybridmajik
item.description:
Where this I assume a “captcha” to type, all there is an advertisement. In this case it’s for Dish’s Hopper service. It forced me to use the audio version which is hard to understand, even for me. It took me 4-5 tries before it finally said I got it right. Just thought I’d mention it as I have another in-game bug to report, but almost said screw it because of the registration issues.
